modName: Gondorian Ranger Armor and Ithilien Ranger Cloak - LOTR
descriptionHtml:
[color=green]Gondorian Ranger Armor and Ithilien Ranger Cloak Standalone[/color]

Author: haldir307
CO-Authors: MartinPurvis, Faelrin and NoseGoblin

[color=Orange]For many times people reporting me the same problems they have when installing with and without NMM, but after my reply it works again, those problems doesn't exist at all in my mods, its happening from their mistake, did not get all the files they need and did wrong installation.
On the other hand, they may not read the description at all, NOT MY PROBLEM!
So pay attention because i wont reply anymore for the same subject!

1) First you need to install the Main File and then the Update File, NOT just the Update File!!!
2) About the Optional File(s), first you need to install the Main File and then the Update File, NOT just the Update File,
then the Optional File(s) if you want, also NOT just the Optional File(s)!!!
3) On NMM while overriding a file over the other, it says you "A different version of **** has been detected. The installed version is, the new version is.",
and it asks you "Would you like to upgrade?", also it says you "Selecting NO it will the new Mod normally", you should click NO and not YES, it will keep the main file and will replace the update files over the main file, same goes for the optional files.

Its not hard to do it so! oo[/color]

[color=red][[[@To all

Why i changed the Main File's version from 3.0 to 1.0 and the Update File's version from 3.1 to 1.1:
Because for long time i had deleted the previous versions and makes people wander,
"if that is v3 where is v2 and v1?", so i changed the versions of the new uploaded files.
In case of downloading and installing with Nexus Mod Manager:
People who download those files for first time there will be no problem.
*Those who already have the Main File v3, do not download the new update,
first uninstall the Main File v3, download and install the Main File v1.0, then download and install
the Update File v1.1!

If you have issues like that the mod is not working, that the armor is invisible, that the armor doesn't show up in blacksmith or anything else, now i explain what you all do wrong, because i tested and the mod is working great like to all other people who installed it corectly and works great to them too!

What you make wrong is:
You downloaded only the Update File "GRA Female version - Ithilien Cloak for male and female" and installed it, but not first the Main File "Gondorian_Ranger_Armour"!

Why you have those issues:
Because the Main File contains the Meshes and Textures of the male armor only, also the esp file does not have armor rate and its my mistake.

What you have to do is:
You must first install the Main File and then the Update File to replace the old esp with the new esp, the esp in Update File is fixing the armor rate also adds female armor and missing cloak.

Where are the: armor, gloves, boots, hood, cape and cloak in blacksmith:
The armor, gloves, boots and hood are in the Leather section, but the cape and cloak are in Misc section.

If you will install like i say, then it will work like to all other people works.]]][/color]

Many thanks to Martin Purvis who gave me the permission to retexture his
LOTR Ranger Armour and he made the male version into standalone for me.
Many thanks to doodaboom who gave me the permission to retexture his
Forest Scout Hood and Forest Scout Cape from his mod Scout Armor,
also many thanks to Rudyard who made it standalone for me. ^^

[color=green]Gondorian Ranger Bow can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20417[/color]

On this link can get Martin's Purvis LOTR Ranger Armour
which is the standalone version of NoseGoblin's mod.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10283
*Edit: It has been removed by MartinPurvis!
For the case you do not have it, Nosegoblin's Assassins Rangers and Thieves armor.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4632/?

[color=green]Description:
Everything is standalone for every race.
Now and female version, sorry for the delay, but i did not modding about over a year.

Installation:
Extract "Gondorian_Ranger_Armour" and copy the folder "Data" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrim

Run SkyrimLauncher, click to Data Files and checkmark the empty box of the GondorianRangerArmor.esp,
checkmark the empty box of Load Loose Files and click OK.
Attention please, if the Data Files section is grey and isn't working, go to this directory:
C:Users****DocumentsMy GamesSkyrim
and open SkyrimPrefs.ini, find the [Launcher] and type under of the last line,
those two lines exactly like they are:
bEnableFileSelection=1
bLoadLooseFiles=1
Save and close it, go back to SkyrimLauncher and enable the checkmarks i told before,
you are ready to enjoy the Gondorian Ranger Armor and Ithilien Ranger Cloak.[/color]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=cyan]Update:
GRA Female version - Ithilien Cloak for male and female

Many thanks to alduin78 who reminded me that i had a cowl in the older version
and now i made it as Ithilien Cloak, also that he advised me to make the female version.

Description:
The update 2 contains meshes and textures of the female version.
Now the Ithilien Cloak is available for male and female, which in the main file's
esp was not duplicated, sorry for that! xD
Also armor rating is fixed in the update's esp!

Installation:
First you need the main file installed!
Extract "GRA Female version - Ithilien Cloak for male and female" and copy the folders "Meshes" and "Textures" and "GondorianRangerArmor.esp" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData and replace all.[/color]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=CadetBlue]Stormcloak or Imperial faction

Description:
You can use the Gondorian Ranger Armor during the faction quest of Stormcloaks
or Imperials, choose one esp from the Optional Files.

Installation:
First you need the main file installed!
Extract "GRA - Stormcloak Faction" or "GRA - Imperial Faction" version,
copy the esp "GondorianRangerArmor" to C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData
and replace it.[/color]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=brown]New Optional Cape

Description:
This cape have two colored sides, the outside of the cape is Olive-Green and
the inside of the cape is Light-Brown.
Now for females too.
In images you can see it how it looks like.

Installation:
First you need the main file installed!
Extract "GRA - New Optional Cape" and copy the folders "Meshes" and "Textures" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData and replace all.[/color]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=yellow]Gondorian Ranger Armor - Retextured Chestpiece

Many thanks to alduin78 who gave me this cool idea. ^^

Description:
Just a retexture on the chest piece.
Now for females too.

Required mod: Gondorian Ranger Armor

Installation:
First you need the main file installed!
Extract G.R.A-retextured_chestpiece version, copy the folder "textures" to
C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData
and replace all.[/color]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=orange]GRA - Leather Shirt
Many thanks to alduin78 who gave me this idea too. ^^

Description:
Just a change on the shirt part of the armor, i turned it from chainmail to leather.

Required mod: Gondorian Ranger Armor

Installation:
First you need the main file installed!
Extract "GRA - Leather Shirt" and copy the folders "Textures" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData and replace all.[/color]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=silver]GRA Bigger Tree - Tweaked Shirt - Removed Side Bag and Pouches

Many thanks to Dragten who helped me to find where there buckle was in armor's texture so i can delete it.
Also very big thanks to Faelrin who showed me how to make invisible the armor's parts from the texture
and that he removed those parts from the armor's meshes.

Description:
In the armor texture, i made the tree bigger and made a tweak on the neck side of the shirt.

Required mod: Gondorian Ranger Armor

Installation:
First you need the main file installed!
Extract "GRA Bigger Tree - Tweaked Shirt - Removed Side Bag and Pouches" and copy the folders "Meshes" and "Textures" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData and replace all.[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=NavajoWhite]Recommended mods:
Lotr Elven Hunting Knife by Alduin78
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49792/?

Hadhafang - Arwens Sword - LOTR by Yogensya
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8456/?[/color]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=olive]Gondorian Ranger Armor and Ithilien Ranger Cloak textures, Female armor version remeshed and retextured, Retextured Chestpiece, Leather Shirt textures, Bigger Tree and Tweaked Shirt textures, made by me!
Sorry that the resolutions of textures are vanilla, i do not know how to turn them into 2k,
upscaling is not the solution![/color]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=gold]Permissions:
Can ask from NoseGoblin or MartinPurvis to edit their mods.
Can ask from doodaboom to edit his mod.
Sorry, but after some hours of retexturing and many methods to fix the super shine on armor,
i don't give the permission to edit and upload it to other sites!
[b][i]*Translations are allowed, no need to ask me.Â 
[b][i][u]***Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my mods on Steam Workshop as their own to obtain money, my mods will always stay on nexus for free![/u][/i][/b]
[/i][/b]
Credits:
The credits goes to MartinPurvis who made the meshes,changed textures for NoseGoblin texture mod
and convert my textures into standalone, goes to NoseGoblin who first made retextures on the vanilla,
to doodaboom who gave me the permission to retexture his Forest Scout Hood and
Forest Scout Cape from his mod Scout Armor, aslo to Rudyard who made it standalone for me!
Also the credits for the removed parts on the armor's meshes goes to Faelrin!
You can endorse the Gondorian Ranger Armor mod.[/color]
author: haldir307  MartinPurvis  Faelrin and  NoseGoblin
